thread.section_title: Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Hotel Experience
thread.title_full: Good Hotel Experience - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Daniel33133
title: Good Hotel Experience
text: Friendly staff and good accommodations. I also like the location. Close to the MTA Subway and walking distance to the West Village. I enjoyed the breakfast and other amenities even though I did not take full advantage. Good value. I plan to stay at this hotel the next time I visit New York City.
